gov.va.med.srcalc.domain.model

Class ValueMatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.va.med.srcalc.domain.model.ValueMatcher

  • @Embeddable
public final class ValueMatcher
extends java.lang.Object
    An object which evaluates a Value to true or false using a Spring Expression Language (SPeL) expression.

      • evaluate

        public boolean evaluate(org.springframework.expression.EvaluationContext context,
               Value value)
        Evaluate this ValueMatcher's boolean expression based on the given context and value. If the apply condition flag is false, this method will always return true.
        Parameters:
        context - the EvaluationContext used to evaluate this matcher against
        value - the value for this matcher's variable
        Returns:
        the boolean value to which the expression evaluates
